text:
Hi all,
I'm facing `[ERROR] Unknown argument: overwrite` when using hs upload. I've upgraded to 3.0.2, but had the same with 2.2.2.
Full command is
`hs upload  web/templates/layouts \"<customer name omitted>/web/templates/layouts\" --overwrite`
(not sure it's worth mentioning it's chained with a second one using &)
Any ideas?

I'm sure we've seen it working since I'm on a busy repo. :innocent:
`--overwrite` is actually not an option for upload <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upload>. That option is only applicable when `fetch`ing.
Should just be able to remove that!
